sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext} from 'react' import {itemContext} from '../../'; var store = require('store'); const DeliveryInfo=()=> { const iL = useContext(itemContext); const {loggedIn} = iL.state; const getUserDetails = store.get('user'); const getItems = store.get('orderedItems'); const totalCost =store.get('totalCost')?? 0; const offerPrice=()=>{ let oP=0; if(totalCost>=599 && totalCost<999){ oP=100; } else if(totalCost>=999 && totalCost<1300){ oP=200; } else if(totalCost>=1300){ oP=300; } return oP; } return (

{ loggedIn ? "Thanks For Your Order. We will reach you soon with your delicious food" : "Your Cart is Empty..!!"}

{getUserDetails && getItems.length>0 ? (

Order Details

Status: Delivery Pending
Payment Mode: Cash
Order Time: {new Date().toLocaleString()}
Delivery To: {getUserDetails ? getUserDetails["addr"] : ''}

Order Summary

{getItems.map( l=> ( ))}
Item Name Item Price Quantity Amount
{l.itemName} {l.price} {l.quantity} {l.quantity*l.price}
Subtotal
₹{totalCost}
Delivery Charges
₹20
Offer Price
-₹{offerPrice()}
Total
₹{totalCost+20-offerPrice()}
) :
Something went wrong. Please visit the page after sometime.
}
) } export default DeliveryInfo;
